]

config.testName: Single named leased space is unavailable for purchase by other users
config.testDescription: For an opportunity with 1 spaces: Check the opportunity has 1 space in the feed. Run C1 and C2 to book one item (creating an named lease) - during this run call C2 twice, and check that both times there are still 1 remaining space from this UUID's perspective. Check the opportunity has 0 space in the feed. Run C1 and C2 again for a new Order UUID for the same opportunity attempting to book 1 space, expecting OrderItems to be returned having an OpportunityCapacityIsReservedByLeaseError.
